file_insights.description: Enhanced grid validation with cross-validation and complex error checking mechanisms
major_changes: Added cross-validation between grid geometry and cell detection
Added configuration constants for validation thresholds

patterns_discovered: Cross-stage validation of image extraction results
Multi-dimensional error detection in grid shape
Detailed error reporting with stage and field specificity
gotchas_discovered: Potential false positives in hole detection
Significant confidence gaps between extraction stages indicate potential issues
recommendations: Continuously tune validation thresholds based on real-world puzzle data
Consider machine learning approaches to dynamically adjust detection confidence
Develop visualization tools to help diagnose complex validation errors
Create a comprehensive test suite covering various grid shape scenarios
